data.author: Sigmund Freud
data.quote: The ego is not master in its own house.

data.author: Sigmund Freud
data.quote: Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise.

data.author: Sherlock Holmes
data.quote: The world is full of obvious things which nobody by any chance ever observes.

data.author: Sherlock Holmes
data.quote: There is nothing more deceptive than an obvious fact.

data.author: Nikola Tesla
data.quote: Be alone, that is the secret of invention; be alone, that is when ideas are born.

data.author: Nikola Tesla
data.quote: Of all things, I liked books best.

data.author: Tao Tzu
data.quote: When goodness is lost, it is replaced by morality.

data.author: Tao Tzu
data.quote: He who knows, does not speak. He who speaks, does not know.

data.author: Benjamin Graham
data.quote: Those who do not remember the past are condemned to repeat it.

data.author: Benjamin Graham
data.quote: Abnormally good or abnormally bad conditions do not last forever.

data.author: George R.R. Martin
data.quote: Fear cuts deeper than swords.

data.author: George R.R. Martin
data.quote: Most men would rather deny a hard truth than face it.

data.author: Dalai Lama
data.quote: Love is the absence of judgment.

data.author: Dalai Lama
data.quote: Know the rules well, so you can break them effectively.

data.author: John Nash
data.quote: The only thing greater than the power of the mind is the courage of the heart.

data.author: John Nash
data.quote: There is often a number of solutions for a given problem.

data.author: Richard Dawkins
data.quote: 'Chance' is just a word expressing ignorance.

data.author: Richard Dawkins
data.quote: Let us try to teach generosity and altruism, because we are all born selfish.

data.author: Leonardo da Vinci
data.quote: Nothing strengthens authority so much as silence.

data.author: Leonardo da Vinci
data.quote: The noblest pleasure is the joy of understanding
